title: BBC Local Live: Coventry and Warwickshire on Friday 2 June 2017 - BBC News
summary: letter of 'support ' delivered to coventry mosque .
police continue to question murder suspect .
fresh bid to oust unite union boss .
transport design centre opens at university .
woakes out for rest of champion trophy .

documents.title: trott ton can not prevent bears follow-on
text: trott ton can not prevent bears follow-on

documents.title: bears suffer as ervine & adams set record
text: bears suffer as ervine & adams set record

documents.title: motofest to attract 120,000 into city
text: motofest to attract 120,000 into city

documents.title: ervine & adams help hants dominate bears
text: ervine & adams help hants dominate bears

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from us this week .
please join us again from 08:00 on monday for more news , sport , travel and weather updates .
any breaking news will be posted here in the meantime .

documents.title: cricket : hampshire vs warwickshire latest
text: play is continuing in hampshire as warwickshire take on the home side in the county championship .
hampshire are batting and are currently 271 for 3 .
there 's ball-by-ball commentary on the bbc sport website and the bbc sports app .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : dry and sunny over the weekend
text: we might see some rain tonight , but it should be a sunny weekend for most of us .
it will be a little cooler though , with temperatures staying below 20c ( 68f ) .
author: Rebecca Wood
BBC Weather

documents.title: world 's top women cyclists to ride through west midlands
text: the provisional list of all 102 riders set to take part in next week 's women 's tour has been released .

nine of the world 's top ten ranked riders will take part in the five day race , which starts in daventry next wednesday and passes through stoke-on-trent and warwickshire before concluding in london .
all three previous champions of the event will take part , with lizzie deignan hoping to defend her title .
the line-up for the ovo energy women 's tour is exceptional and fans can now look forward to watching five days of action-packed , exciting racing . ''

documents.title: 'lovely ' mosque letter praised by community
text: a letter offering `` love , peace and solidarity '' to mosque worshippers in coventry has been praised by the community .
the anonymous letter was written in the wake of the terror attack at an ariana grande concert in manchester last week in which 22 people were killed .
the note , written by a coventry resident , urges its muslim recipients to `` stay strong '' and ignore `` the small-minded '' people looking for a `` scapegoat '' for the attack .
there 's so much negative news and headlines about muslims , it 's nice to see that people can see through this . ''

documents.title: man bailed while investigations continue into atherstone man 's death
text: police have bailed a 31-year-old man from coventry , arrested on sus of murder , until the end of june as they continue to investigate the death of an atherstone man .
jake palfreyman , who was 21 , was found in barsby close on sunday evening with serious head and torso injuries and died in hospital the following day .
another 50-year-old man from atherstone , arrested on sus of murder , has been bailed until the end of the month .
a second man from atherstone , aged 20 , arrested on sus of attempted murder , has been released `` under investigation '' , police say .
author: Moira Rawlings
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: brexit , nhs and the economy on the minds of nuneaton voters
text: voters in nuneaton have been sharing their thoughts with the bbc coventry & warwickshire election bus team .
the vehicle is in the town this afternoon to gather people 's views ahead of a debate with the electoral candidates later .
you can pay the bus a visit in market place and have your say .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: hampshire steadily accumulatehampshire 202-3 v warwickshire
text: hampshire got through the middle session at southampton without losing a wicket as warwickshire 's bowlers struggled to get life out of a slow pitch since taking three wickets in the first hour .
the batsmen have looked comfortable although timing shots has n't always been easy with the ball not coming onto the bat .
sean ervine has been impressively productive under the circumstances , reaching his first century of the season .
warwickshire are missing jeetan patel , who 's with new zealand 's champions trophy squad .
that leaves sunny singh as their main spinner with andrew umeed and even rikki clarke offering support .
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport at Ageas Bowl

documents.title: ice hockey : blaze announce a new signing
text: coventry blaze has announced the signing of canadian forward danick paquette .
the 26-year-old winger joins the club from tulsa oilers .
he scored 13 goals in 46 appearances for the us side last season .
danick is a huge signing for us in so many ways .
he 's a tough cookie and will bring a huge physical element to our team .
our fans are going to love him . ''
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: football : gael bigirimana set to leave sky blues
text: coventry city has confirmed gael bigirimana is set to leave the club .
the midfielder has agreed terms with scottish side motherwell and will join them following the end of his contract in july .
bigirimana scored for the sky blues during their recent checkatrade trophy final win against oxford united at wembley .
author: Geoff Foster
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: football : sky blues defender `` feels settled '' at club
text: coventry city 's defender , chris stokes , says he 's targeting a return to the third tier of english football at the first time of asking next season .
the defender signed a new two-year deal with the club on thursday .
he says he believes the side can go `` straight back up '' to league one next season following their relegation from the division .
`` it was a tough season for myself and the team last year .
we 've got to put that to the back of our mind and focus on coventry city returning to the higher divisions . ''
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: grant for jaguar land rover 's slovakian factory to be investigated
text: the european commission has launched an investigation into plans by the slovakian government to grant £ 108 million to jaguar land rover in support of its new car factory in the country .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: letter to coventry mosque 'almost moved ' recipient to tears
text: the woman who was given a letter of support to a mosque in coventry says she `` almost cried '' when it was handed to her .
the letter written by a woman in the wake of the terror attack at manchester arena last week in which 22 people were killed by a suicide bomber .
the note , written by a coventry resident , sends `` love , peace and solidarity '' to its muslim recipients during a time when people are looking for a `` scapegoat '' for the attack .
i was up my kids from the mosque when the woman came up to me and asked if i was going inside .
she asked if i could give this note to the mosque leaders and told me how she thought our religion was beautiful and how she just wanted to hug us all . ''

documents.title: hampshire make strong recoveryhampshire 136-3 v warwickshire
text: after being 31-3 inside 45 minutes , hampshire are recovering thanks to sean ervine and jimmy adams .
the former has had a relatively lean time in the championship , his only previous half-century coming in the first innings against middlesex also at the ageas bowl .
adams has been recalled chiefly because liam dawson who has been opening the batting recently , is with the lions .
adams took 35 minutes to get off the mark this morning , but has since added solidity to an innings that is building after those early shocks .
the pitch here at the ageas bowl is pretty slow , but is drier , and the grass has been cut tighter , at each end on a spinners length .
will be interesting to see how the spinners fare as we get further into the game .
author: Kevan James
Sport Presenter, BBC Radio Solent at Ageas Bowl

documents.title: voters reminded of postal deadline
text: warwick district council is reminding postal voters to return their ballot papers by 22:00 next thursday if their vote is to be counted in the upcoming general election .
postal votes for # ge2017 need to be back with us by 10pm on 8 june .
you can return your ballot paper by post or to your polling station

documents.title: nuneaton 's hoop guy fails to make it to britain 's got talent final
text: despite the backing of nuneaton , last night the town 's very own hoop guy failed to make it through to the finals of britain 's got talent .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: election bus arrives in nuneaton
text: the bbc coventry & warwickshire election bus has arrived in nuneaton .
the team are ready and waiting to hear your thoughts on next week 's general election .
pay them a visit in market place .
author: Shelley Phelps
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire, Political Reporter

documents.title: ex-bbc host found woodland sex 'erotic '
text: ex-bbc host found woodland sex 'erotic '

documents.title: barker impresses as adams battleshampshire 82-3 v warwickshire
text: an outstanding spell of bowling from the pavilion end by keith barker has been the highlight on the first morning at southampton .
he nearly had a wicket from the first ball of the day , edged just short of slip by michael carberry .
but barker did n't have to wait long before making carberry his 300th first-class victim .
he soon added the wicket of rilee rossouw with a glorious in-swinger and hampshire were in trouble when george bailey fell to a boyd rankin delivery which stopped on him .
but jimmy adams batted patiently through the session to finish it on 18 , still 29 runs short of reaching 13,000 career first class runs .
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport at Ageas Bowl

documents.title: cricket : career milestone for warwickshire seamer
text: warwickshire 's left-armed keith barker has passed a career milestone by bagging his 300th first class victim .

barker at first chose professional football , first on the books of blackburn rovers , then on loan at rochdale , in belgium with cercle bruges , and northwich victoria before giving up football to play first-class cricket .
| after taking two wickets this morning keith barker has now passed 300 first-class wickets .
well done barks !
# youbears
your off stump is terrified # barkersonfire

documents.title: football : sky blues goalkeeper signs two-year deal
text: coventry city goalkeeper , lee burge , has agreed a new two-year contract with the sky blues .
the 24-year old academy graduate made a total of 39 appearances during the club 's last campaign .
he becomes the second player in as many days to sign a new two-year contract at the club , with defender chris stokes committing his future yesterday .
author: Geoff Foster
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: ex-bbc presenter says sex with young stranger 'empowered her '
text: an ex-bbc wm presenter has told a court he `` stepped to one side '' to let a young stranger engage in a public sex act with his wife because it `` empowered '' her .
tony wadsworth said his wife julie found the daytime encounter with the male in woodland in the 1990s `` exhilarating and exciting '' .
the couple are on trial at warwick crown court accused of encouraging boys to take part in sexual activity in warwickshire woods between 1992 and 1996 .
both have accepted having sexual encounters with what mrs wadsworth described as `` young men '' in the forest , but deny they were children .
mrs wadsworth , has pleaded not guilty to 11 charges of indecent assault , while her 69-year-old husband denies nine counts of the same offence .
the trial continues

documents.title: cricket : hampshire vs warwickshire latest
text: play is underway in hampshire as warwickshire take on the home side in the county championship .
hampshire are batting and are currently 67 for 3 .
there 's ball-by-ball commentary on the bbc sport website and the bbc sports app .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: bus diversions announced for motofest
text: national express coventry has published a list of bus diversions during the motofest event in coventry city centre over the weekend .
diversions to services around the rail station this weekend due to motofest .
more information can be found at

documents.title: letter of 'support ' delivered to coventry mosque
text: a letter offering `` love , peace and solidarity '' has been delivered to a mosque in coventry .
it follows the terror attack at manchester arena last week in which 22 people were killed by a suicide bomber .
the anonymous note , written by a coventry resident , urges its muslim recipients to `` stay strong '' and ignore `` the small-minded '' people looking for a `` scapegoat '' for the attack .

documents.title: football : sky blues to confirm more signings
text: coventry city club say they expect to confirm more signings in the next few days .
defender chris stokes has already signed a two-year deal which will keep him at the club until the end of 2019 .
the side will play in league 2 next season after their latest campaign ended in relegation .
author: Geoff Foster
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: zoo hope recycling phones will save apes
text: a zoo in atherstone is urging people to recycle their old mobile phones to help protect great apes in the wild .
from monday , twycross zoo is encouraging visitors to dispose of their unwanted handsets in an environmentally friendly way .
it 's part of a scheme to raise awareness of the plight of the endangered bonobo species in the democratic republic of congo .

documents.title: women hit by car in coventry
text: a woman suffered `` serious leg injuries '' after a collision between a car and two pedestrians in coventry on wednesday , police say .
west midlands police say the two women were walking across a crossing on sky blue way at around 08:50 when they were struck by a car .
the woman who was injured remains in hospital .

documents.title: football : brakes ' star leaves club
text: leamington fc has confirmed jack edwards is leaving to club to join national league side solihull moors .
the club say the midfielder has described the move as a `` gut wrenching decision '' .
his transfer comes after a successful campaign which saw the brakes secure promotion to the vanarama national league north .

documents.title: coventry 'gearing up ' for fun-fuelled weekend
text: the organisers behind a two-day transport show in coventry say they are putting final preparations in place .
motofest , the uk 's largest free car festival , will take place this weekend in coventry city centre .
it 'll be based around greyfriars green and broadgate , with the ring road closed for demonstration laps .
they 'll be classic cars to look at [ and ] our classic bikes are riding in from kenilworth castle . ''
author: Trish Adudu
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: more coventry 'job announcements ' promised by employment boss
text: the man in charge of employment at coventry city council has promised further job announcements .
the promise came after a major london-based organisation was confirmed as a new tenant of the city 's friargate development .
the company will not be named until after the general election .
we want coventry to be the centre of excellence it 's really important we work together with our partners .
over £ 700m of investment is going on whitley at the moment and we want to build on that , and friargate is one part of that . ''

documents.title: cricket : woakes ruled out of champions trophy
text: warwickshire 's chris woakes will not play in the remainder of the champions trophy , the england and wales cricket board has announced .
the all rounder up a side strain during england 's eight wicket win over bangladesh yesterday .
he only managed to bowl two overs .
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: fresh bid to oust unite union boss by defeated west midlands regional secretary
text: the west midlands regional secretary of the unite union is to try and overturn the election which led to len mccluskey being reappointed as its leader .
the defeated candidate in the contest , gerard coyne , says his supporters suffered bullying and intimidation .
the trade union regulator will be asked to rule that unite 's recent general secretary election , which mr mccluskey won by 5,500 votes , was invalid .
a spokeswoman for unite said its members would be deeply disappointed by the timing of the announcement .
author: Ross Hawkins
Political correspondent

documents.title: new transport design centre for coventry university
text: a £ 7m transport design centre has been opened at coventry university .
the institution wants to work with automotive , rail , marine and aerospace firms to help them grow the centre .
it was part-funded by the local enterprise partnership and the government 's local growth deal .
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: police continue to question murder suspect over atherstone man 's death
text: police have until tonight to question a 31-year-old coventry man arrested on sus of murdering an atherstone man .
jake palfreyman , who was 21 , was found in barsby close on sunday evening with serious head and torso injuries and died in hospital the following day .
another 50-year-old man from atherstone , arrested on sus of murder , has been bailed until the end of the month .
a second man from atherstone , aged 20 , arrested on sus of attempted murder , has been released under investigation .
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: watch : friday 's weather forecast for the west midlands
text: here 's how your friday is looking on the weather front - keep up-to-date with the latest forecasts on the bbc weather website .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning from the newsroom
text: it 's friday and we 're here with another pre-weekend burst of news , sport and travel .
we 'll bring you the latest weather forecast shortly .
if you want to get in touch you can email , tweet us @ twitterid or message us via our facebook page .

documents.title: our coverage across the day
text: we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday .
join us then .

documents.title: football : rugby town re-sign goalkeeper
text: rugby town have re-signed goalkeeper niall cooper on a one-year contract .
the 26 year old spent last season with southern league premier side stratford town .

documents.title: football : sky blues pleased with season ticket sales
text: coventry city say they 're delighted with the number of season tickets they have sold so far .
despite their relegation to league two , fans have snapped up more than 3,000 .
commercial director dave boddy said it showed the `` interest is clearly there '' and that fans were excited by the squad-building so far .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: murder inquiry police name victim , 21
text: murder inquiry police name victim , 21

documents.title: travellers told to move from coventry site
text: the police and council officials are evicting a group of travellers who 've settled on land in alderman 's green , coventry
the travellers had been told they had to be off the land on honeysuckle lane by 15:30 .

documents.title: weather : a fine end to the day but showers forecast tomorrow
text: it 's going to be a fine night across the region , but we are forecast some colder weather and rain tomorrow .
author: Shefali Oza
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: rugby union : wasps hooker out of argentina tour
text: the wasps hooker tommy taylor has been ruled out of england 's two-test tour of argentina through injury .
he 's suffered a knee ligament injury in training .
eddie jones ' england side play argentina on 10 and 17 june .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: mystery organisation relocating to friargate is 'positive news '
text: a new tenant , set to bring 320 employees with it , has been found for coventry 's friargate development - but its identity is not being revealed for now .
the city council said it would not say who 's coming until after the general election next week .
what we do know is that the organisation is relocating from london and will take two floors of the new 11-storey one friargate complex , now nearing completion near the railway station .
councillor jim o'boyle , cabinet member for jobs and regeneration , described it as `` positive news '' .
this has all happened really quickly - in fact it 's all been sorted in under a month . ''

documents.title: bomb disposal team called to 'grenade ' find
text: an army bomb disposal unit has been called to weston under wetherley after what appeared to be an old grenade was found in a loft .
the device turned out to be safe and there was no need for a controlled explosion .

documents.title: your photos : sunny weather around oxhill and wormleighton
text: it looks beautiful around warwickshire today , as you can see from these photos taken by bbc weather watchers in oxhill and wormleighton .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: priest in emotional support after manchester attacks
text: a priest from rugby says he had to give emotional support to the victims of the manchester arena bombing and the emergency services who responded .
liam johnston 's a chaplain with british transport police and spent last week in manchester , helping those come to terms with what happened .
twenty-two people died and 116 were injured in a suicide bombing at an ariana grande concert at manchester arena .
when there is a trauma like this it brings up things from people 's pasts so officers would talk about traumatic incidents that happened in the past that they are now reliving emotionally . ''
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: stokes signs new contract at coventry
text: stokes signs new contract at coventry

documents.title: would you like a job firing the trebuchet at warwick castle ?
text: warwick castle is looking for a good team leader to oversee the operation of the medieval siege engine .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: cycle race road closure details released
text: the women 's tour cycle race will be passing through warwickshire on friday , 9 june .
you can find a full list of road closures on the warwickshire county council website .
you can find details of road closures in # kenilworth and # leamingtonspa for the women 's tour on friday 9 june here
congratulations on writing a great uk gov tweet .
( ranked 25th for jun 1 . )

documents.title: armed police called to building society
text: armed officers have been sent to the coventry building society in barkers butts lane , radford , after reports of a man demanding money from staff , police say .
a spokesperson for the west midlands force said : `` armed police officers attended after it was reported he may have had a gun , although one was not seen and no threats were made .
no-one was injured . ''

documents.title: cricket : road closures in place for international tournament
text: edgabston is the venue for five matches in the champions trophy in june , so do n't get caught out by road closures .
england made their tournament start against bangladesh at the oval earlier today .
new zealand take on australia at edgbaston tomorrow , with the birmingham venue hosting india v pakistan on sunday .
going to @ twitterid for any of the @ twitterid matches ?
fan guide ( inc rd closure info ) here : # ct17 # sportbrum
so when you say road closures at `` peak times '' what are the ball park time of the road closures lasting to-from ?
this link offers more detail :
fantastic , thank you

documents.title: major organisation heading to coventry remains a secret
text: a major new client is to move into the friargate development , but the name wo n't be revealed until after the general election , bbc coventry and warwickshire understands .

both the city council and the organisation , currently based in london , told their staff this morning , but have signed a confidentiality agreement which does n't run out until the polls close next thursday .
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: cricket : injury fear for woakes in champions trophy game
text: warwickshire 's chris woakes has suffered a side strain , up while bowling against bangladesh in england 's first game in the icc champions trophy .
he 's so far bowled only two overs , conceding four runs .
you can follow the game on the bbc sport live page .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: new electric vehicle battery centre could create 10,000 jobs
text: up to 10,000 new jobs could be created in coventry if the go-ahead is given to create a national centre to develop batteries for the electric vehicles of the future .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: woman cut free after car rolls on to side
text: a woman 's had to be cut free from a car after it ended up on its side on a road near stratford-upon-avon .
warwickshire fire service says it happened this morning at about 08:20 on birmingham road in bishopton hill .
they say two fire crews worked to release her and she was then given treatment by paramedics - it 's not known what injuries she suffered .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nuneaton man held after manchester attack released without charge
text: a man from nuneaton , arrested in connection with last week 's bomb attack in manchester , has been released without charge .
greater manchester police said the 21 year old was initially arrested on wednesday .
of 16 people originally held after the 22 may bombing , 10 are still in custody for questioning .
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: summer crackdown on drink and drug driving
text: west midlands police starts a month-long campaign today to test drivers for alcohol and drugs .
motorists face roadside checks by force officers and motorway police .

sgt mark bull from the force 's road policing unit said : `` there are big risks involved with drink or drug driving , not only are you risking killing or injuring yourself or others you also risk losing your licence and potentially your livelihood .
`` such behaviour is totally unacceptable and drivers found to be driving in excess of the limit will be put before the court . ''

documents.title: cricket : woakes bowls as england begin icc champions trophy campaign
text: warwickshire 's chris woakes is among the england team taking on bangladesh in their first match of the icc champions trophy .
he 's bowling already as england , having won the toss , have elected to field first - follow the action here on the bbc sport website .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather watcher rugby and wishaw
text: the sunshine 's out again today and our bbc weather watchers have been snapping away across warwickshire .
here are two from users outwiththedog in wishaw and graham hedges in rugby .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: election debate : candidates ' pledges over future of nhs
text: in last night 's bbc coventry and warwickshire election debate , the candidates for coventry south were asked for their views on the future of the nhs .
here 's what they said :
also standing in the seat is independent sandra findlay - if you missed the debate you can hear it again via the bbc iplayer .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: cricket : rankin set for warwickshire return following back injury
text: warwickshire fast bowler boyd rankin is in line to make his first start of the 2017 season following a back injury .
the 32-year-old ireland , and ex-england , international has not featured for the bears since last july , having suffered a fractured tibia in training .
rankin was fit enough to make four appearances in seven days for ireland in january , in the desert t20 in dubai .
but he then suffered his most recent problem , another back injury , while on ireland duty again in april .
he came through a second xi match last week against derbyshire bowling almost 20 overs to take 3-60 in the match .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: town 's oldest charity closes
text: stratford-upon-avon 's oldest local charity , the mayor 's fund , is to close this year .
author: Stratford Herald

documents.title: election debate - listen again
text: the nhs , brexit and education were the main to for candidates in coventry south during bbc coventry and warwickshire 's election debate .
it was held last night at the old grammar school on hales street .
if you missed the debate - you can hear it again via the bbc iplayer .

documents.title: watch : the weather forecast for the west midlands today
text: here 's how today is shaping up , find out if you can leave the coat behind at home .
you can also keep regularly up-to-date with the latest forecasts by heading to the bbc weather website .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning from coventry and warwickshire
text: morning .
we 'll have a weather update for you shortly and then get stuck into the news .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day

documents.title: your lock gates in the sun
text: it started off cloudy , as you can see from this from bbc weather watcher g man taken in offchurch this morning , but then it brightened up .
dammo caught the sun shining on the lock gates at kingswood .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: lords date for school table cricket team
text: pupils from wilson stuart school will be representing warwickshire at lord 's on june 9 at the lord 's taverners table cricket finals .
they will compete with nine other schools in a competition organised by the lord 's taverners , the youth cricket and disability sports charity .

played on a table tennis table with side panels and sliding fielders , a ball launcher , weighted plastic ball and wooden bat , table cricket enables young people with severe physical and learning disabilities to enjoy cricket and represent their school on a competitive basis , the charity says .

documents.title: youths caught throwing stones from bridge
text: yobs have been caught red-handed throwing stones at traffic from a bridge over the a444 in bedworth .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: weather : more cloud forecast tomorrow
text: we 're forecast some rain later in the week , but tomorrow is looking pretty much the same as today - cloudy and warm , with temperatures up to 22c ( 72f ) .
author: Shefali Oza
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: fresh appeal for witnesses to fatal collision
text: only `` a very limited number of witnesses '' have come forward to a hit-and-run incident in which an 80-year-old woman died , police say .
warwickshire police say the junction where the collision occurred was `` heavily congested with traffic '' at the time , and they are appealing for anyone who saw the incident to come forward .
the collision happened on the b4451 in gaydon at about 18:00 on 15 february and involved a grey ford fiesta and a white bmw which failed to stop at the scene .

the driver and passenger from the fiesta , a 56-year-old woman and an 80-year-old woman , were taken to university hospital coventry and warwickshire with serious injuries , where the 80-year-old died the following day .

documents.title: fire crews condemn suspected arson attack
text: fire crews have condemned a suspected arson attack on a derelict building in sydenham which took place this weekend .
author: Leamington Courier

documents.title: coventry enjoys donald trump 's late-night # covfefe tweet
text: people have been having a lot of fun with donald trump 's late night # covfefe tweet today .
it appears he meant to write `` coverage '' , but people have been enjoying some light-hearted speculation about what else the word could mean .
and virgin trains have got in on the act and suggested it could be coventry train station .
euston to # covfefe in less than an hour
we just had a bigly # covfefe on the 18.07 london to lpool we could n't find the platform at stafford # late4tea
oh no !
did you find it in the end ? !

i think the train driver has to do a 3 point turn !
# neveradullday # mycommute
might be a bit tricky hope you find a seat ^hp
this made me laugh !
we do our best ^mw
can i use my friends and family railcard ?
hmmmm , i 'm going to say no ^mw
ah well
is this the one that goes via birmeme outernational ?
that 's the one !
^mw

^cb

documents.title: airport owner expanding operations
text: the owner of coventry airport , sir peter rigby , is expanding his operations by taking over the corporate jet centre at birmingham airport .
his company , xlr , is expanding to add new routes to new york , india and qatar .

documents.title: city-wide bookie ban for troublemakers
text: a `` banned from one , banned from all '' policy is being introduced by eight of coventry 's betting firms to help prevent crimes such as robbery , assault , theft and anti-social behaviour , police say .
bookies have signed up to a new bet watch initiative which enables them to share information on criminal offences or abusive punters with each other and police .

those who commit such offences face a criminal record and through bet watch we will work together to catch those responsible and ensure that staff and other customers feel safe in their surroundings . ''

documents.title: bishop 'shocked ' after couple found dead
text: bishop 'shocked ' after couple found dead

documents.title: dad to run event to thank charity for their 'invaluable ' care
text: a warwick dad is taking on the `` frothiest fun run in the world '' to give back to the charity that provides `` invaluable '' care for his daughter .
author: Leamington Courier

documents.title: invictus games : former soldier says event will help his recovery
text: a former soldier from rugby says taking part in the invictus games in canada is good for his physical and psychological rehab .
james mcgill was severely wounded when an explosive device went off during a foot patrol in afghanistan six years ago .
he 's been named in the uk team taking part in the event dedicated to injured military personnel .
it 's about making new friends and sharing everybody 's experiences and being a part of those experiences and enjoying each other 's path to recovery and trying to inspire each other . ''
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: rugby : new signing tipped to boost wasps ' attacking play
text: wasps ' director of rugby says new signing juan de jongh will benefit the club 's attacking play next season .
the 29-year-old south africa centre will join up with the club after completing the south african super rugby season .
de jongh has won 19 caps since scoring a try on his international debut against wales in june 2010 .
juan 's international experience and ability to play 12 and 13 will benefit us .
he has a good eye for a gap and plenty of pace which makes him dangerous in attack , while he also has strong organisational skills in defence . ''
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: second murder arrest after man dies
text: second murder arrest after man dies

documents.title: cathedral pays tribute to rugby woman found dead with husband
text: tributes have been paid to a rugby woman after she was found dead with her husband , rugby borough council manager sean lawson , over the bank holiday weekend .
mary lawson , 63 , was a canon of leicester cathedral and also served as the director of education for the diocese between 2010 and 2014 .

the bishop of leicester , the rt revd martyn snow , said she `` made a very significant contribution to the work of the church across the diocese '' and that he was `` shocked and saddened '' by news of her death .
warwickshire police said they were not treating the deaths of the couple as sus

documents.title: football : leamington re-sign defenders for next season
text: leamington have re-signed defenders connor gudger and richard taundry for the new season .
both have made more than 100 appearances for the brakes .
the pair were a core part of paul holleran 's defensive unit in their promotion campaign .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: warwick 's natwest branch officially closed
text: the warwick branch of natwest has now officially closed .
author: Warwick Courier

documents.title: tributes paid to council boss found dead with his wife
text: tributes are being paid to a senior rugby council worker after he was found dead with his wife over the bank holiday weekend .
mr lawson had worked at the authority for more than 12 years as head of its environment and public realm department .
warwickshire police said they were not treating the deaths as sus
sean was a big character in the local authority , he was much loved by his colleagues and very well known for the services he provided .

documents.title: cricket : dougie brown 'stronger ' since losing warwickshire job
text: the former warwickshire director of cricket dougie brown says he 's become a stronger person in the months since he lost his job with the bears .
under brown 's leadership , the bears won two trophies , the t20 blast in 2014 and one-day cup last month .
he was sacked in october and brown is now the head coach of the united arab emirates .
you do question what you 've been doing .
let 's be honest , do you get everything right ?
no you do n't .
am i proud of what i 've achieved as a coach at warwickshire ?
yes i am .
would i do things differently ?
possibly , yes . ''
author: Clive Eakin
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: on midlands today from 13:30 : breast surgeon jailed for 15 years
text: on midlands today this lunchtime , we 'll have reaction as west midlands breast surgeon ian paterson has been jailed today for 15 years .
he 'd previously been found guilty of 17 counts of wounding with intent and three counts of unlawful wounding .
we 'll have the full story from 13:30 on bbc one .
author: Nicola Beckford
Reporter, BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: woman sexually assaulted by three men
text: three men have sexually assaulted a woman in polesworth .
warwickshire police says it happened in march but had n't been reported to the force until last week .
officers say the victim was walking at the back of the park near the b5000 at about 18:30 .
they say a man stopped to talk to her and , while she was talking , she was grabbed from behind and sexually assaulted .
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: fans to be called on to raise cash for coventry city bid
text: the sky blue trust says it 'll be asking fans to help them raise funds for a consortium trying to buy coventry city .
they 've teamed up with the group led by gary hoffman , who 've already had three bids rejected by current owners sisu .
the club 's owners , sisu , had described the group 's two previous offers as `` derisory '' and insisted there had been no discussions between the two parties .

fans have campaigned for sisu , now in their 10th year as club owners , to sell the relegated league one club , who will be playing in english football 's fourth tier for the first time in 58 years next season .
it 's fairly early days in the process yet .
there 's lots of details to be finalised but the idea is to get supporters having an involvement in ownership and having some say in the running of the club . ''
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: dog walker in alleged assault after being hit by car
text: a dog walker 's reported to have been assaulted in stratford-upon-avon after being hit by a car .
warwickshire police says the collision happened earlier this month at the junction of joseph way and birmingham road .
the force says the victim , a man in his 70s , was crossing the road with his dog when he was hit by a white ssangyong rodius .
they say it 's then been reported he was involved in an `` altercation '' but say nobody was hurt .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: your sunny-ish southam
text: the sun is there behind the clouds , we promise !
weather watcher old salt has shared this they described the backdrop as `` some blue , some bright , but , mainly cloudy '' .
share your weather by signing up here .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: home care provider creating 50 new jobs in coventry
text: more than 50 jobs are being created in coventry by a home care provider which has won a brace of contracts with the city council .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: further arrest in atherstone murder probe
text: a man from coventry 's been arrested on sus of murder after another man died in atherstone .
paramedics found the 21-year-old victim in barsby close on sunday evening and he died in hospital the following morning .
warwickshire police says yesterday afternoon they arrested a 31-year-old man from coventry on sus of murder .
the force says they 've also been given more time to question a 50-year-old man from atherstone who was already in custody , arrested on sus of murder .
a 20-year-old man has been released under investigation .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: coventry would 'suffer without immigrants '
text: a migration expert at coventry university says the city 's economy would suffer without immigrants .
immigration and brexit are in the top three issues for voters , according to a poll by ipsos mori .
phoebe griffiths , a research fellow at coventry university , told bbc coventry and warwickshire coventry would `` suffer '' without people coming to the city .

documents.title: covfefe , cov who ?
text: twitter blew up overnight following this tweet from the potus .
first came confusion , then came laughter and then back to confusion again .
is this a simple typo ?

the urban dictionary seems to think so - yes there are already dictionary definitions on this - it describes then noun as `` when you want to say `` coverage '' but your hands are too small to hit all the letters on your keyboard . ''
the word is trending on twitter , with many tweeters having their say on what it means
could he have been alluding to coventry ?
thoughts on a postcard , facebook or the president 's preferred communication tool , twitter .

documents.title: woman treated for leg injuries after car crash
text: a woman in her 20s is being treated for leg injuries after a collision with a car in coventry .
it happened near the pedestrian crossing at the bottom of sky blue way just before 09:00 this morning .
west midlands ambulance service say they have got two ambulances and a paramedic team at the scene .

documents.title: rugby soldier heads to canada for invictus games
text: a former soldier from rugby has been included in the uk 's team for the invictus games in canada .
james mcgill joins the 90-strong team of injured military veterans for the paralympic event , started by prince harry in 2014 .
the invictus games is the only international sporting event for wounded , injured & sick servicemen & women .
good luck all of you going to the invictus games !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
it 's nice to see prince william following in his mother 's foot steps being there for the people
respect
hey harry hanging with the narcissistic obama takes away from your good works for servicemen .
bo is hated by us servicemen
good luck everyone i will be supporting you all
se va entendiendo muy loable un esfuerzo que gane el mejor
you started a great thing , harry !
ca n't wait to cheer for these inspiring women and men in september !
already winners , every one .
thankyou .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: the whole world is talking about cov !
text: and by `` whole world '' we mean twitter - which is the same thing - and by `` cov '' we mean `` covfefe '' the word president trump 's twitter account inadvertently , or deliberately , coined last night .
take a look here
that was tweeted at about 06:00 bst - and it 's still up .
so far it 's been retweeted more than 100,000 times .
we 're not saying it definitely is about our fair city , but also , that 's exactly what we 're saying .
but what 's a `` fefe '' , other than how `` thief '' is pronounced on eastenders ?
and what 's it got to do with cov ?
let us know .
in the meantime , we 're off for a bit of a think , possibly a lie down , and a nice cup of covfefe .

documents.title: nuneaton man remains in police custody over manchester attack
text: police are continuing to question a man from nuneaton in connection with the manchester bomb attack which left 22 people dead , including a number of children .
he was the seventh man to be arrested by police .
three men have been released without charge while 11 people remain in police custody .
author: Monica Rimmer
Journalist, BBC Online

documents.title: watch : your 50-second weather forecast
text: mostly cloudy skies at first with the odd patch of early morning mist and fog possible .
however , the cloud will break to allow more in the way of sunshine by the afternoon , along with an isolated shower for some .
highs of 20c ( 68f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning from coventry and warwickshire live
text: welcome to our live service on wednesday .
we 'll be bringing you all the latest news , sport , travel and weather for coventry and warwickshire between now and 18:00 .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email , tweet us or message via facebook .

text: star 'believed sex accuser was 17 '

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 'll be back with our usual mix of news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 tomorrow .
from 22:30 you can follow live online updates on the west midlands general election debate .

documents.title: two sky blues players in international duty
text: sky blues duo george thomas and cian harries are in action for wales under-20s tonight in the toulon tournament .
they take on hosts france in their opening game of the competition .
thomas says his good form for coventry at the back of the season should serve him well .
news : @ twitterid & @ twitterid on international duty for @ twitterid this evening .
# pusb
good luck lads
he george signed his new deal yet ? , or turned it down ?

documents.title: shock figures reveal over 100 reports of assaults on ambulance staff
text: front line ambulance staff in coventry and warwickshire were assaulted over 100 times in the past year while on duty .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: weather : a dry night and sunny spells tomorrow
text: we 're forecast a dry and mild night , with some sunshine breaking through the cloud tomorrow .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: motofest pays tribute to sir roger moore
text: the original aston martin dbs - as driven by sir roger moore - will be joining the line-up at this weekend 's motofest in coventry .
the organisers say in a tribute to the actor , who died last week , the vehicle he drove in the popular tv series the persuaders !
will be on show at coventry cathedral during the weekend .
the event takes place on saturday and sunday with a crowd of around 100,000 expected .

documents.title: senior council worker and wife found dead in rugby
text: a leading rugby council worker and his wife have been found dead , the leader has said .
in a statement councillor michael stokes said it was with `` great sadness '' he had to announce the news of sean lawson 's death .
`` sean was close to his staff and news of his death has been a shock to us all , '' he said .
sean had worked at the authority for 12 years , most recently as head of environment and public realm , overseeing a number of major projects .
the police confirmed they were called to a property on wiggins close , rugby and that the bodies of a 50-year-old man and a 63-year-old woman were discovered .
they are not treating the deaths as sus
author: Vanessa Pearce
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man stripped and left unconscious in robbery
text: a man was left unconscious , stripped of his clothes and with injuries to his eye and ribs after being attacked by two men in bedworth , police say .
the victim - whose phone was also stolen - was taken to hospital after the incident , near to a small lake on smorral lane , at around 23:53 on friday night .
police are looking for two men in their 20s , one of which , they believe , was driving a silver volkswagen polo .

documents.title: jacob umaga named in england u20 squad to play samoa
text: wasps academy player jacob umaga has been named in the england u20 squad for the opening mach of the world rugby championship match against samoa .
head coach ian vass says he is expecting a tough , physical battle from samoa , which kicks-off at 10:30 tomorrow in georgia .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: sex trial told 'victim got too old '
text: sex trial told 'victim got too old '

documents.title: ice hockey : ashley tait leaves coventry blaze
text: british forward ashley tait will not be part of his 2017/18 elite league roster , coventry blaze has announced .
the 41-year-old has made 590 appearances for the club with 207 goals and 320 assists .

tait , who first joined the organisation in 2002 has captained the team to eight major trophies , the first coming in his debut season as blaze recorded a british national league ( bnl ) double winning the league and playoffs .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: thief admits stealing aston martin db11 before joyride through quiet streets
text: a man has admitted stealing an aston martin worth more than £ 150,000 which was then seen racing through a quiet warwickshire town .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: man arrested in atherstone murder probe
text: man arrested in atherstone murder probe
